Alaris.Irc.NameGenerator

Alaris.Irc.NameGenerator Class Reference

Generates random, made-up names. The names appear to be language neutral (sort of). More...

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 NameGenerator ()
 Create an instance.
string MakeName ()
 Generates a name randomly using certain construction rules. The name will be different each time it is called.

Detailed Description

Generates random, made-up names. The names appear to be language neutral (sort of).

This is a port of the orginal Javascript written by John Ahlschwede, ahlschwede@hotmail.com

Member Function Documentation

string Alaris.Irc.NameGenerator.MakeName (  ) 

Generates a name randomly using certain construction rules. The name will be different each time it is called.

Returns:
A name string.
